topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: Accessing the Operations Console

body.p: Operations Console is the web GUI for administering your cloud deployment's monitoring and infrastructure.

section.title: Accessing Operations Console
section.p: To determine which IP to use to access the Operations Console you can use this command from your deployer:
The output of that command will show you the VIP you should use. It is listening over port 9095 on that VIP, so you can use the following syntax to access it:http://VIP:9095
section.note: The credentials for your admin user account can be changed. See Keystone Configuration for more details.
